result.arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: And for the wrongdoers, there will be another punishment before that[17], but most of them do not know.
result.footnotes: [17] In this world such as famine, droughts, or defeat at the battle, or punishment in the grave.
